item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: 新建文章 hugo new posts/my-first-post.md 或者直接在 content/posts目录手动创建my-first-post.md Start the Hugo server hugo server -D 启动后可以本地预览 Build static pages hugo -D 自用主题 极简主义 yinyang 构建脚本 deploy.sh #!/bin/sh # If a command fails then the deploy stops # set -e printf "\033[0;32mDeploying updates to GitHub...\033[0m\n" # Build the project. hugo -D # if using a theme, replace with `hugo -t <YOURTHEME>` # Commit changes. msg="rebuilding site $(date)" if [ -n "$*" ]; then msg="$*" fi # Go To Public folder cd public # Add changes to git.
